PROGRAM NAME UNKNOWN: an error was found
      help-params:
            Bad parameter name: "no-such-param"
            To see a list of parameter names try '-help-show params-named'.
            To see a full list, add '-help-all'.
            To see just the names, add '-help-summary'.
            At: [command line]: Supplied Parameter:2: -help-params
            help-groups,help,no-such-param

Try the '-help' parameter for more information.
